mapper.select: SELECT r.data_scope FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_delete = 0

SELECT r.id, r.NAME, r.LEVEL, r.description, r.data_scope, r.create_by, r.update_by, r.create_time, r.update_time, r.is_delete FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.is_delete = 0 AND r.is_delete = 0 AND u.id = #{userId}
